<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Perfect Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=901) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Student of Perfection](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=18)

**Prerequisites**
[Student of Perfection Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=900)

</column>

---

You gain the [_perfect strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=542) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
name: Perfect Strike

<traits>
